cards.name: Abyssal Specter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

cards.flavor:
"The soldier's path is worn smooth by the tread of many feet—all in one direction, none returning."
—Oracle en-Vec
cards.name: Advance Scout
cards.text:
First strike
{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

cards.flavor: These spirits of the air are winsome and wild and cannot be truly contained. Only marginally intelligent, they often substitute whimsy for strategy, delighting in mischief and mayhem.
cards.name: Air Elemental
cards.text: Flying

cards.flavor: If only every message were as perfect as its bearer.
cards.name: Angelic Page
cards.text:
Flying
{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Rainclouds don't last long in Shiv, but that doesn't stop the lightning.
cards.name: Arc Lightning
cards.text: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

cards.flavor:
Sharpen your ears
—Elvish expression meaning
"grow wiser"
cards.name: Argothian Elder
cards.text: {T}: Untap two target lands.

cards.flavor:
"I always charge a little extra to take on a pegasus. They fly like eagles, kick like mules, and hide like hermits."
—Tahlil en-Dal, bounty hunter
cards.name: Armored Pegasus
cards.text: Flying

cards.flavor:
Little dreamt could seem so cruel
As waiting for the wings outspread,
The jagged teeth, the burning eyes,
And dagger-claws that clench to nerves.
cards.name: Azure Drake
cards.text: Flying

cards.flavor:
"Don't look at it! Maybe it'll go away!"
—Ib Halfheart, goblin tactician
cards.name: Blinking Spirit
cards.text: {0}: Return Blinking Spirit to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor:
"I think I used up all my good luck and all my bad luck in the same fall."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight
cards.name: Broken Fall
cards.text: Return Broken Fall to its owner's hand: Regenerate target creature.

cards.flavor: Its windpipe is only the first to amplify its maddening laughter.
cards.name: Cackling Fiend
cards.text: When Cackling Fiend enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.

cards.flavor: Radiant's eyes flashed. "Go, then," the angel spat at Serra, "and leave this world to those who truly care."
cards.name: Catastrophe
cards.text: Destroy all lands or all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Cinder Marsh
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Cinder Marsh doesn't untap during your next untap step.

cards.text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.

cards.text: Counter target spell.

cards.flavor: They are Phyrexia's couriers; the messages they carry are inscribed on their slick hides.
cards.name: Crazed Skirge
cards.text: Flying, haste

cards.flavor: ". . . But I'm not tired!"
cards.name: Curfew
cards.text: Each player returns a creature he or she controls to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Dark Ritual
cards.text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: Few of Rath's rivers follow a steady course, so many new channels are carved for them.
cards.name: Dirtcowl Wurm
cards.text: Whenever an opponent plays a land, put a +1/+1 counter on Dirtcowl Wurm.

cards.flavor:
"I implore you not to forget the horrors of the past. You would have us start the Brothers' War anew"
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic
cards.name: Disenchant
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.flavor:
"Teferi is a problem student. Always late for class. No appreciation for constructive use of time."
—Barrin, progress report
cards.name: Disruptive Student
cards.text: {T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

cards.name: Drifting Meadow
cards.text:
Drifting Meadow enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.name: Elvish Lyrist
cards.text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Elvish Lyrist: Destroy target enchantment.

cards.flavor:
"Death—an outmoded concept. We sleep, and we change."
—Sitrik, birth priest
cards.name: Exhume
cards.text: Each player puts a creature card from his or her graveyard onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor: Life is eternal. A lifetime is ephemeral.
cards.name: Fecundity
cards.text: Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller may draw a card.

cards.flavor: The forest was too lush for the brothers to despoil—almost.
cards.name: Fertile Ground
cards.text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

cards.flavor: Visitors to Shiv fear the dragons, the goblins, or the viashino. Natives fear the ants.
cards.name: Fire Ants
cards.text: {T}: Fire Ants deals 1 damage to each other creature without flying.

cards.flavor:
"A dash of cool water does wonders to clear a cluttered battlefield."
—Vibekke Ragnild, Witches and War
cards.name: Flood
cards.text: {U}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.

cards.name: Giant Growth
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: They were formidable even before they learned the use of weapons.
cards.name: Gorilla Warrior
Healing Salve
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Target player gains 3 life.
• Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

cards.flavor: It's not known whether the Thran built the device to forge their wonders or to defend them.
cards.name: Heat Ray
cards.text: Heat Ray deals X damage to target creature.

cards.name: Hurricane
cards.text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

cards.flavor:
"The true dishonor for a soldier is surviving the war."
—Telim'Tor
cards.name: Infantry Veteran
cards.text: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Land Tax
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

cards.flavor:
"Ach! Hans, run! It's the Lhurgoyf!"
—Saffi Eriksdotter, last words
cards.name: Lhurgoyf
cards.text: Lhurgoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

cards.flavor: A lightning elemental once killed an entire tribe of merfolk—simply by going for a swim.
cards.name: Lightning Elemental
cards.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

cards.name: Living Death
cards.text: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor:
One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot.
—Llanowar penalty for trespassing
cards.name: Llanowar Elves
cards.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor:
"Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch."
—Naimah, Femeref philosopher
cards.name: Man-o'-War
cards.text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor:
"The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy."
—Volrath
cards.name: Mana Leak
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

cards.flavor: Only by sacrificing any semblance of defense could Gerrard best Greven.
cards.name: Maniacal Rage

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.

cards.flavor:
"Water is firmament to the finned."
—Oracle en-Vec
cards.name: Manta Riders
cards.text: {U}: Manta Riders gains flying until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"A skilled decoy can throw your enemies off your trail. A master decoy can survive to do it again."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

cards.text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

cards.name: Mogg Hollows
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Mogg Hollows doesn't untap during your next untap step.

cards.flavor:
"I have seen the horrors Kaervek has freed. My Betrayal is certain—but of Kaervek or of Jamuraa, I cannot say."
—Jolrael

cards.text:
First strike
When Nekrataal enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. That creature can't be regenerated.

cards.flavor:
"He cocooned himself alone in his workshop for months. When he finally emerged, all broad grins and excited chatter, I knew he'd found his answer."
—Barrin, master wizard
cards.name: Opportunity
cards.text: Target player draws four cards.

cards.flavor: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.
cards.name: Pacifism
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

cards.text:
At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Pestilence.

cards.flavor: Phyrexia wastes nothing. Its food chain is a spiraling cycle.
cards.name: Phyrexian Ghoul
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"No fair! Since when does a bug get ta munch on me?"
—Squee, goblin cabin hand

cards.flavor:
" . . . And the third little boar built his house out of rootwalla plates . . . ."
—Skyshroud children's story

cards.flavor: Occasionally members of the Institute of Arcane Study acquire a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.
cards.name: Prodigal Sorcerer
cards.text: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.flavor: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.
cards.name: Raging Goblin
cards.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

cards.flavor: "Heel."
cards.name: Ray of Command
cards.text: Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the creature, tap it.

cards.flavor:
"You will learn to earn death."
—Volrath
cards.name: Reanimate
cards.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

Remote Isle enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor:
"But no one heard the snake's gentle hiss for peace over the elephant's trumpeting of war."
—Afari, Tales
cards.name: River Boa
cards.text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
{G}: Regenerate River Boa.

cards.flavor: "Such rage," thought Vhati, gazing up at the thunderhead from the Predator. "It is Greven's mind manifest."
cards.name: Rolling Thunder
cards.text: Rolling Thunder deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

cards.flavor:
"First blood isn't as important as last blood."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight
cards.name: Sadistic Glee

Enchant creature
Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.

cards.flavor: Serra told them to guard Urza as he healed. Five years they stood.
cards.name: Sanctum Custodian
cards.text: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

cards.flavor: "Protect our mother in her womb."
cards.name: Sanctum Guardian
cards.text: Sacrifice Sanctum Guardian: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature or player this turn, prevent that damage.

cards.flavor: Even the landscape turned against Sarsour, first rising up and pelting him, then rearranging itself so he could no longer find his way.
cards.name: Sandstorm
cards.text: Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.

cards.flavor:
"Flourishing during the Ice Age, these wurms were the bane of all Kjeldorans. Their great size and ferocity made them the subject of countless nightmares—they embodied the worst of the Ice Age."
—Kjeldor: Ice Civilization
cards.name: Scaled Wurm

cards.flavor: The only sound was the gentle clicking of the faeries' wings. Then those intruders who were still standing turned and fled. One thing was certain: they didn't think the Scryb were very funny anymore.
cards.name: Scryb Sprites
cards.text: Flying

cards.flavor: There are only two rules of tactics: never be without a plan, and never rely on it.
cards.name: Seasoned Marshal
cards.text: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.

cards.flavor:
"We shun them not for their dream but for their refusal to let such a noble dream die a noble death."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves
cards.name: Seeker of Skybreak
cards.text: {T}: Untap target creature.

cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

cards.flavor:
You lie down with rats, and the rats run away.
—Suq'Ata insult

cards.text: {B}, Pay 1 life: Sewer Rats gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than three times each turn.

cards.flavor: The viashino had learned how to operate the rig through trial and error—mostly error.

cards.flavor:
"Civilization is a conspiracy to disguise the mutilation of nature."
—Skyshroud elite creed

"Children of the Ruins, raised to be warriors, know that life begins when another speaks their names."
—Soltari Tales of Life

cards.text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

cards.flavor: The true names of birds are songs woven into their souls.
cards.name: Songstitcher
cards.text: {1}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by target attacking creature with flying.

cards.flavor:
Count carefully the souls and see that none are lost.
—Vec teaching
cards.name: Soul Warden
cards.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

Spike Colony enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.

Spike Worker enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Worker: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

cards.flavor: The viashino knew of the cracked pipes but deliberately left them unmended to bolster the rig's defenses.

cards.text: Steam Blast deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

cards.flavor: Kerrick's corrupt domain swelled like a blister on Tolaria's skin.
cards.name: Subversion
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

cards.flavor:
"And darkness shall be cast from me
For my soul resides in the Sun."
—Femeref dirge

Enchant creature

cards.flavor: Although the elves of Argoth always considered them a nuisance, the pixies made fine allies during the war against the machines.

cards.flavor: These are its last days. But it will not go quietly.

cards.flavor:
"If fear is the only tool you have left, then you'll never control me."
—Xantcha, to Gix

cards.flavor:
"Oi oi oi, me gotta hurt in 'ere,
Oi oi oi, me smell a ting is near,

'n da hurt'll disappear."
—Troll chant

—Qhattib, vizier of Amiqat

"No bird soars too high, if he soars with his own wings."
—William Blake,

"To fill your mind with knowledge, we must start by emptying it."
—Barrin, master wizard
